column3: User defined name, not used by the program, cannot be blank
id of this rifle, used by reference in other csv files such as oobs, also used to identify from the string tables, the textual name of this weapon
id of this rifle's ammunition, used to identify from the string tables, the textual name of this ammunition
The closest range where this rifle would be used (in yards)
The most accurate range of this rifle (in yards)
The typical range where this rifle was fired (in yards)
A very long range for using this rifle (in yards)
The farthest away that this rifle has any chance of hitting a target (in yards)
The base percent chance that this rifle has of successfully being loaded and fired, this can be modified by other factors, so this should be the lowest chance of success for a rookie infantryman
The rate of fire for this weapon, this is the number of seconds it takes the least experienced soldier to reload the rifle
The fastest possible rate of fire in seconds for this weapon
